languages.text: Situated in the Sol System, Mars is the seat of the highest power of Tech-Priests, a planet given over in ages past to holy industry, an irradiated wasteland with an unbreathable atmosphere, and a place where the Adeptus Mechanicus hoards the arcane secrets of the Omnissiah in its underground facilities.
languages.original_text: Марс является святейшим местом паломничества для адептов Культа Механикус. Генерал-фабрикатор — политический и религиозный лидер Красной Планеты, а также официальный глава Адептус Механикус. Он пожизненно входит в состав Верховных Лордов Терры.

traits.locale_text: It is considered the holiest place of pilgrimage for adepts of the Cult Mechanicus. As political and religious ruler of the Red Planet, the Fabricator General is ex officio head of the Adeptus Mechanicus, and holds a permanent position as one of the High Lords of Terra.

It is considered the holiest place of pilgrimage for adepts of the Cult Mechanicus. As political and religious ruler of the Red Planet, the Fabricator General is ex officio head of the Adeptus Mechanicus, and holds a permanent position as one of the High Lords of Terra.

Situated in the Sol System, Mars is the seat of the highest power of Tech-Priests, a planet given over in ages past to holy industry, an irradiated wasteland with an unbreathable atmosphere, and a place where the Adeptus Mechanicus hoards the arcane secrets of the Omnissiah in its underground facilities.

languages.text: Марс является святейшим местом паломничества для адептов Культа Механикус. Генерал-фабрикатор — политический и религиозный лидер Красной Планеты, а также официальный глава Адептус Механикус. Он пожизненно входит в состав Верховных Лордов Терры.

Der im Sol-System gelegene Mars ist der Hauptsitz der Techpriester, ein Planet, der in vergangenen Zeiten der heiligen Industrie übergeben wurde. Er ist ein verstrahltes Ödland mit nicht atembarer Atmosphäre, auf dem das Adeptus Mechanicus in unterirdischen Anlagen die arkanen Geheimnisse des Omnissiah hütet.
languages.original_text: Situated in the Sol System, Mars is the seat of the highest power of Tech-Priests, a planet given over in ages past to holy industry, an irradiated wasteland with an unbreathable atmosphere, and a place where the Adeptus Mechanicus hoards the arcane secrets of the Omnissiah in its underground facilities.

traits.locale_text: Der im Sol-System gelegene Mars ist der Hauptsitz der Techpriester, ein Planet, der in vergangenen Zeiten der heiligen Industrie übergeben wurde. Er ist ein verstrahltes Ödland mit nicht atembarer Atmosphäre und ein Ort, an dem das Adeptus Mechanicus in den unterirdischen Anlagen die arkanen Geheimnisse des Omnissiah hütet.

languages.text: Située dans le système Sol, Mars est le siège de la plus haute instance des technoprêtres. Jadis vouée à l'industrie sacrée, elle n'est plus qu'une terre désolée et irradiée à l'atmosphère irrespirable et un lieu où l'Adeptus Mechanicus conserve les secrets de l'Omnimessie dans des installations souterraines.
languages.original_text: Situated in the Sol System, Mars is the seat of the highest power of Tech-Priests, a planet given over in ages past to holy industry, an irradiated wasteland with an unbreathable atmosphere, and a place where the Adeptus Mechanicus hoards the arcane secrets of the Omnissiah in its underground facilities.

traits.locale_text: Située dans le système Sol, Mars est le siège de la plus haute puissance des technoprêtres, une planète vouée jadis à l'industrie sacrée, une terre désolée irradiée à l'atmosphère irrespirable et un lieu où l'Adeptus Mechanicus conserve les secrets de l'Omnimessie dans des installations souterraines.

languages.text: 火星位于太阳系，是技术神甫最高权力的所在地。这颗行星遍布神圣的工业设施，是一片充满辐射的荒地，充斥着无法呼吸的大气。在这里，机械修会在他们的地下设施之中，隐藏着欧姆尼塞亚的无数秘密。
languages.original_text: Situated in the Sol System, Mars is the seat of the highest power of Tech-Priests, a planet given over in ages past to holy industry, an irradiated wasteland with an unbreathable atmosphere, and a place where the Adeptus Mechanicus hoards the arcane secrets of the Omnissiah in its underground facilities.

traits.locale_text: 火星位于太阳系，是技术祭司最高权力的所在地。这颗行星遍布神圣的工业设施，是一片充满辐射的荒地，充斥着无法呼吸的大气。在这里，机械修会在他们的地下设施之中，隐藏着欧姆尼塞亚的无数秘密。

languages.text: 太陽系（ソル・システム）に位置する火星（マーズ）は、技術司祭の最高権力の座であり、太古の昔に聖なる産業に捧げられた惑星であり、大気は呼吸不可能、放射線に覆われた荒れ地であり、地下施設では帝国技術局が万機神の難解な秘儀を大量に集めている場所である。
languages.original_text: Situated in the Sol System, Mars is the seat of the highest power of Tech-Priests, a planet given over in ages past to holy industry, an irradiated wasteland with an unbreathable atmosphere, and a place where the Adeptus Mechanicus hoards the arcane secrets of the Omnissiah in its underground facilities.

traits.locale_text: 太陽系（ソル・システム）に位置する火星（マーズ）は、技術司祭の最高権力の座であり、太古の昔に聖なる産業に捧げられた惑星であり、大気は呼吸不可能、放射線に覆われた荒れ地であり、地下施設では帝国技術局が万機神の難解な秘儀を大量に集めている場所である。

languages.text: Marte, situado en el sistema Sol, es la sede del poder supremo de los tecnosacerdotes, un planeta dado desde hace siglos a la industria sagrada, un páramo irradiado con una atmósfera irrespirable y un enclave en cuyas instalaciones subterráneas el Adeptus Mechanicus atesora los secretos arcanos del Omnissiah.
languages.original_text: Situated in the Sol System, Mars is the seat of the highest power of Tech-Priests, a planet given over in ages past to holy industry, an irradiated wasteland with an unbreathable atmosphere, and a place where the Adeptus Mechanicus hoards the arcane secrets of the Omnissiah in its underground facilities.

traits.locale_text: Marte, situado en el sistema Sol, es la sede del poder supremo de los tecnosacerdotes, un planeta dado desde hace siglos a la industria sagrada, un páramo irradiado con una atmósfera irrespirable y un enclave en cuyas instalaciones subterráneas el Adeptus Mechanicus atesora los secretos arcanos del Omnissiah.

languages.text: Güneş Sistemi'nde yer alan Mars, Tekno Rahip yapılanmasının merkezidir. Çağlar öncesinde kutsal sanayiye adanmış bir gezegen, nefes alınamaz atmosfere sahip radyoaktif çorak bir arazi ve Adeptus Mechanicus'un yer altı tesislerinde Hermesih'in gizemli sırlarını sakladığı bir yerdir.
languages.original_text: Situated in the Sol System, Mars is the seat of the highest power of Tech-Priests, a planet given over in ages past to holy industry, an irradiated wasteland with an unbreathable atmosphere, and a place where the Adeptus Mechanicus hoards the arcane secrets of the Omnissiah in its underground facilities.
